# fetchReminders(matching:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Fetches reminders that match a given predicate.

## Declaration

```swift
func fetchReminders(matching predicate: NSPredicate, completion: @escaping ([EKReminder]?) -> Void) -> Any
```

## Parameters

- **predicate**: A search predicate created with [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKEventStore/predicateForReminders(in:)].
- **completion**: A closure that receives the reminders that match `predicate`.

## Return Value

A value that represents the asynchronous fetch request. To cancel a fetch request before it completes, pass this value to [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKEventStore/cancelFetchRequest(_:)].

## Discussion

Only committed reminders are included in the results. To include reminders saved using [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKEventStore/save(_:commit:)] with the `commit` parameter set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], call [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKEventStore/commit()] first.

This method fetches reminders asynchronously.

## Searching calendars

- **enumerateEvents(matching:using:)**: Finds all events that match a given predicate and calls a given callback for each event found.
- **events(matching:)**: Finds all events that match a given predicate.
- **cancelFetchRequest(_:)**: Cancels the request to fetch reminders.
- **predicateForEvents(withStart:end:calendars:)**: Creates a predicate to identify events that occur within a given date range.
- **predicateForReminders(in:)**: Creates a predicate to identify all reminders in a collection of calendars.
- **predicateForCompletedReminders(withCompletionDateStarting:ending:calendars:)**: Creates a predicate to identify all completed reminders that occur within a given date range.
- **predicateForIncompleteReminders(withDueDateStarting:ending:calendars:)**: Creates a predicate to identify all incomplete reminders that occur within a given date range.
- **EKEventSearchCallback**: The signature for a closure that operates on events when enumerating them.
